verses.verse: "Now at that time <S%H6256><s%> Michael, <S%H4317><s%> the great <S%H1419><s%> prince <S%H8269><s%> who stands <S%H5975><s%> [guard] over <S%H5921><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of your people, <S%H5971><s%> will arise. <S%H5975><s%> And there will be a time <S%H6256><s%> of distress <S%H6869><s%> such <S%H834><s%> as never <S%H3808><s%> occurred <S%H1961><s%> since <S%H4480><s%> there was a nation <S%H1471><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> that time; <S%H6256><s%> and at that time <S%H6256><s%> your people, <S%H5971><s%> everyone <S%H3605><s%> who is found <S%H4672><s%> written <S%H3789><s%> in the book, <S%H5612><s%> will be rescued. <S%H4422><s%>

"And many <S%H7227><s%> of those who <S%H3463><s%> sleep <S%H3463><s%> in the dust <S%H6083><s%> of the ground <S%H127><s%> will awake, <S%H9516><s%> these <S%H428><s%> to everlasting <S%H5769><s%> life, <S%H9132><s%> but the others <S%H428><s%> to disgrace <S%H2781><s%> [and] everlasting <S%H5769><s%> contempt. <S%H1860><s%>

"And those who have <S%H7919><s%> insight <S%H7919><s%> will shine <S%H9100><s%> brightly <S%H9100><s%> like the brightness <S%H2096><s%> of the expanse <S%H7549><s%> of heaven, <S%H7549><s%> and those who lead <S%H6663><s%> the many <S%H7227><s%> to righteousness, <S%H6663><s%> like the stars <S%H3556><s%> forever <S%H5769><s%> and ever. <S%H5703><s%>

"But as for you, Daniel, <S%H1840><s%> conceal <S%H5640><s%> these words <S%H1697><s%> and seal <S%H2856><s%> up the book <S%H5612><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the end <S%H7093><s%> of time; <S%H6256><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> will go <S%H7751><s%> back <S%H7751><s%> and forth, <S%H7751><s%> and knowledge <S%H1847><s%> will increase. <S%H7235><s%>"

Then I, Daniel, <S%H1840><s%> looked <S%H7200><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> others <S%H312><s%> were standing, <S%H5975><s%> one <S%H259><s%> on this <S%H2008><s%> bank <S%H8193><s%> of the river, <S%H2975><s%> and the other <S%H259><s%> on that bank <S%H8193><s%> of the river. <S%H2975><s%>

And one said <S%H559><s%> to the man <S%H376><s%> dressed <S%H3847><s%> in linen, <S%H906><s%> who <S%H834><s%> was above <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4605><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> of the river, <S%H2975><s%> "How <S%H4970><s%> long <S%H5704><s%> <S%H4970><s%> [will it be] until <S%H5704><s%> the end <S%H7093><s%> of [these] wonders <S%H6382><s%>?"

And I heard <S%H8085><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> dressed <S%H3847><s%> in linen, <S%H906><s%> who <S%H834><s%> was above <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4605><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> of the river, <S%H2975><s%> as he raised <S%H7311><s%> his right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3225><s%> and his left <S%H8040><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> heaven, <S%H8064><s%> and swore <S%H7650><s%> by Him who <S%H2416><s%> lives <S%H2416><s%> forever <S%H5769><s%> that it would be for a time, <S%H4150><s%> times, <S%H4150><s%> and half <S%H2677><s%> [a time;] and as soon as they finish <S%H3615><s%> shattering <S%H5310><s%> the power <S%H3027><s%> of the holy <S%H6944><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> [events] will be completed. <S%H3615><s%>

As for me, I heard <S%H8085><s%> but could not understand; <S%H995><s%> so I said, <S%H559><s%> "My lord, <S%H113><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> [will be] the outcome <S%H319><s%> of these <S%H428><s%> [events?]"

And he said, <S%H559><s%> "Go <S%H1980><s%> [your way,] Daniel, <S%H1840><s%> for [these] words <S%H1697><s%> are concealed <S%H5640><s%> and sealed <S%H2856><s%> up until <S%H5704><s%> the end <S%H7093><s%> time. <S%H6256><s%>

"Many <S%H7227><s%> will be purged, <S%H1305><s%> purified <S%H3835><s%> and refined; <S%H6884><s%> but the wicked <S%H7563><s%> will act <S%H7561><s%> wickedly, <S%H7561><s%> and none <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3605><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> will understand, <S%H995><s%> but those who have <S%H7919><s%> insight <S%H7919><s%> will understand. <S%H995><s%>

"And from the time <S%H6256><s%> that the regular <S%H8548><s%> sacrifice <S%H8548><s%> is abolished, <S%H5493><s%> and the abomination <S%H8251><s%> of desolation <S%H8074><s%> is set <S%H5414><s%> up, [there will be] 1290 days. <S%H3117><s%>
"How blessed <S%H835><s%> is he who keeps waiting <S%H2442><s%> and attains <S%H5060><s%> to the 1335 days! <S%H3117><s%>

"But as for you, go <S%H1980><s%> [your way] to the end; <S%H7093><s%> then you will enter <S%H5117><s%> into rest <S%H5117><s%> and rise <S%H5975><s%> [again] for your allotted <S%H1486><s%> portion <S%H1486><s%> at the end <S%H7093><s%> of the age. <S%H3117><s%>"
